topic.title: Control the Workflow with a Custom Action

section.title: How to control the workflow from within the editor

body.p:
You can even add custom action on the editor toolbar that can be used to control the workflow. For example, one can add actions to check-in & checkout the edited file or mark it as reviewed. To add such actions, one should:
Create a plugin for Web Author
Use our JS API to implement a custom action and add it on a toolbar.
